INSERT INTO channel_category(
channel_id,
channel_code,
channel_category_name,
parent_id,
inner_category_id,
channel_category_level,
channel_category_type,
channel_category_id,

remark,
) VALUES (
#{channelId},
#{channelCode},
#{channelCategoryName},
#{parentId},
#{innerCategoryId},
#{channelCategoryLevel},
#{channelCategoryType},
#{channelCategoryId},
#{channelCategoryPId},

)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE channel_category
channel_code = #{channelCode},
channel_category_name = #{channelCategoryName},
parent_id = #{parentId},
inner_category_id = #{innerCategoryId},
channel_category_level = #{channelCategoryLevel},
channel_category_type = #{channelCategoryType},
channel_category_id = #{channelCategoryId},
channel_category_p_id = #{channelCategoryPId},
remark = #{remark},
WHERE id = #{id}
